Text: If Republicans won't listen to the families, students, teachers & homeowners who will be hurt by the #GOPTaxScam, maybe they'll listen to @AARP & the 5.2 million #seniors whose taxes would increase. Not holding my breath.http://bit.ly/2AHScxM

The American people are justifiably fed up with the government’s failure to instill practical & overdue #transparency measures that increase public access & restore public trust. Read how my #TGA bill shines a light on gov operations & policymakers: http://bit.ly/2i3VwId https://twitter.com/RepMikeQuigley/status/936258500358844416 …

I’ve introduced #TGA every session since I was elected, but I believe it is needed now more than ever. This year, we’ve seen federal agencies scrub information from their official websites & federal appointees fail to disclose potential conflicts of interest.

Today, I reintroduced the #Transparency in Government Act for the 5th time. #TGA strengthens oversight of federal spending, expands financial disclosure requirements & modernizes how the public accesses information. Common-sense steps to increase accountability.
